cvm

类 CVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
      • cvm.CVM
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI

    public class CVM
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
    The class CVM implements the single JVM assembly for the sensor network simulation. There are 50 nodes in the network, 5 clients, and 1 registry. we will set the temperature of the nodes to a random value for the smoke, we will set it to true for all nodes,because it can help us to test the network more effectively.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void deploy()
      simply set the deploymentDone flag to true, so it should be called at the end of the user's own deploy method.
      void finalise()
      perform the execute method on all of the deployed components, calling it as a synchronous task.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void shutdown()
      shut down the CVM, synchronising with the other JVM when distributed, i.e. all of the deployed components in the CVM are shut down; inspired from the Java Executor framework.

      • 从类继承的方法 fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
